nodes.caption: Conditions for team effectiveness - Real team - Enabling structure - Supportive organizational context
Shared understanding - Team goals - Member roles and responsibilities - Patient involvement
Supportive processes - Accountability - Decision-making and conflict resolution - Communication and information exchange
Acting and feeling like a team - Using team skills and knowledge - Giving/using information from others - Valuing, trusting, respecting others
Perceived Team effectiveness - For patients/caregivers - For professionals - For efficiency
